meta.name: The Phantom of the Opera
meta.description: Even in distant Arkham, word of the horror and murder at the Opera Garnier has reached the investigators, and they set out to end the fiendish exploits of the sinister Phantom. Based on the Gaston Leroux novel.
meta.author: The Beard

cards.name: The Phantom of the Opera
cards.text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X.  X is the current act #.
[cultist]: -2.  You may take 1 horror.  If you do not, you cannot expose concealed mini-cards as a result of this test.
[tablet]: -2.  You may take 1 damage.  If you do not, you cannot expose concealed mini-cards as a result of this test.
[elder_thing]: -3.  If you succeed by 2 or more, you may look at the revealed side of a concealed mini-card at your location.

cards.name: The Phantom of the Opera
cards.text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X.  X is equal to 1 + the current act #.
[cultist]: -3.  You may take 1 horror.  If you do not, you cannot expose concealed mini-cards as a result of this test.
[tablet]: -3.  You may take 1 damage.  If you do not, you cannot expose concealed mini-cards as a result of this test.
[elder_thing]: -4.  If you succeed by 3 or more, you may look at the revealed side of a concealed mini-card at your location.

cards.flavor: The atmosphere of revelry seems to both mask and blend with the underlying evil here tonight.  Something more than a lone maniac is haunting your steps, something that the opera managers did not and could not account for.  Whatever it was, you would discover it before long.
cards.name: Sinister Forces
Force Your Hand
cards.text:
A sudden flash of movement catches your eye, and you have mere moments to act! Have you cornered the Phantom, or has he led you into a trap of his own?
Shuffle all concealed mini-cards and redistribute them evenly across all locations in play. The lead investigator must choose and reveal a concealed mini-card. If that mini-card is a decoy, The Phantom attacks each investigator in player order. Otherwise, return the mini-card to that location and shuffle each concealed mini-card at that location. Flip back to agenda 1a.

cards.flavor: The Persian pounds his fist on the stone wall tensely.  "Erik, stop this madness!  There is no humanity in this!"  The Phantom's laughter abruptly stops with a snarl.  "None!  Humanity has scorned and abused me all my life, and for what?  This horrid face?  I forfeit my humanity!  For I have found great wonders beyond!  My single mask is joined by a thousand others!  My music of the night weaves into the cosmic piping!  I will have what I am owed, as will the whole world!  And should you try to deny me... the consequences will be explosive!"
cards.name: Face to Face
Out With a Bang
cards.text:
"The time has come for our exit!" the Phantom roars, "and our exit shall shake the foundations of all Paris!" He cackles madly as your words and weapons fail to reach him, twisting a golden switch on a nearby mantle. Time seems to move in slow motion as an explosion blossoms before you. Your last vision before blackness engulfs you is of the Persian, shoving you and Christine into the murky waters of the sewer.
Each investigator is defeated and suffers a physical or mental trauma (choose one).

cards.flavor: You shake off your nervousness and try to focus on the task at hand.  The masked partygoers mingle around you, but you scrutinize each one in turn.  Any one of them could be the Phantom in disguise... if there is only one of him.
cards.name: Masquerade!
cards.text: [reaction] When The Phantom is exposed: Add 1 clue to the location where The Phantom's mini-card was exposed (from the token bank).

cards.name: Mysteries Upon Mysteries
cards.text:
Your first glimpses of the Phantom are brief, but telling. Piercing eyes glare at you from behind a skull-like mask as you both begin to probe each other... and then he is suddenly gone. Panic begins to set in as thoughts of failure mount, but just as suddenly, a strong hand clasps your shoulder. You whirl around to meet a stern moustached man in a red fez. "There is much to explain and little time. Come with me."
Choose an investigator to take control of the set-aside The Persian. For the remainder of the scenario, he does not take up any slots. Choose a revealed copy of Grand Foyer. Move each investigator, enemy not in the shadows, and concealed mini-card to that copy of Grand Foyer. Remove each other copy of Grand Foyer from the game. Put each set-aside [[Opera House]] location into play. If there are fewer than 2[per_investigator] total concealed mini-cards in play, add additional decoys until that number is met. Shuffle each concealed mini-card in play and redistribute them between each [[Opera House]] location equally.

cards.flavor: "The Phantom has already struck.  Miss Daaé has disappeared, and Raoul is chasing shadows in his desperation.  Whether or not you trust me, I must trust you to find the Phantom's lair before it is too late to prevent a dire tragedy."
cards.name: Chasing Ghosts
cards.text: Forced - After you expose a decoy: The Phantom attacks you. [reaction] When The Phantom would attack an investigator, spend 1 clue: Cancel that attack. Forced - When the Phantom is exposed: Place 1 clue on this act (from the token bank). Objective - Find and complete an objective on another encounter card.

cards.name: Open Invitation
cards.text:
With the Persian's assistance, you scour the opera house, contending with the haunting Phantom until at last you reveal a secret passageway backstage. A booming voice, nearly giddy with laughter, echoes out from the dark shaft. "So you ignore my warnings, interloper? SO BE IT! Step down into the underworld and have your reckoning! I have much more than hell awaiting you!"
Randomly put three of the five set-aside Paris Sewers locations into play in a straight line. Remove each other copy of Paris Sewers from the game. Put the set-aside The Phantom's Lair location into play. If there are fewer than 2[per_investigator] total concealed mini-cards in play, add additional decoys until that number is met. Shuffle each concealed mini-card in play and redistribute them between each copy of Paris Sewers equally. Move each investigator and enemy not in the shadows to the leftmost copy of Paris Sewers. Remove each [[Opera House]] location from the game (or place it in the victory display if is revealed, and has Victory X with no clues on it).

cards.flavor: The Persian clenches his jaw as the Phantom's words fade.  "What madness has gripped him?  When I saved his life so many years ago, I never would have thought him capable of this.  We must delve into the sewers and find him."
cards.name: The Phantom's Domain
cards.text: Forced - After you expose a decoy: The Phantom attacks you. [reaction] When The Phantom would attack an investigator, spend 1 clue: Cancel that attack. Forced - When the Phantom is exposed: Place 1 clue on this act (from the token bank). Objective - Find and complete an objective on another encounter card.

cards.name: Past the Point of No Return
cards.text:
Your harrowing trek through the fetid sewers finally arrives at a hatch in the ceiling of a stone building. You and the Persian steel yourselves before you descend inside. The interior is pitch black at first, but soon a reddish glow builds from the walls around you, and a strong heat with it. Mocking laughter echoes through the chamber as the glow illuminates the cruel and medieval devices inside it. "So you have found my torture chamber! Allow me to show you its ingenious design!"
Move each investigator, enemy not in the shadows, and concealed mini-card to The Phantom's Lair. Remove each copy of Paris Sewers from the game. Put the set-aside Hidden Parlor and Organ Chamber locations into play. If there are fewer than 2[per_investigator] total concealed mini-cards in play, add additional decoys until that number is met. Shuffle each concealed mini-card in play and place them at The Phantom's Lair. Advance directly to agenda 2a.

cards.flavor: The voice of a woman -- who could be no one but Christine -- echoes after his voice.  "Erik, I beg of you, do not harm them!  You promised that there would be no bloodshed!"  You don't know what has transpired between the two, but you can't allow yourself to be killed, or to allow the Phantom's machinations to continue any longer, one way or another.
cards.name: Masks Upon Masks
cards.text: While there is horror on 2 or more locations, you may ignore the forced effect on the Phantom. Forced - When The Phantom enters a location: Put the set-aside Christine Daaé into play at his location. Objective - If The Phantom is defeated, advance.

cards.name: The Curtain Falls
cards.text:
If The Phantom was defeated:
The Phantom drops to the cold stone floor, clutching his wounds and breathing raggedly. "So you... have killed me... Stare then... upon this damnable face...!" With his last ounce of strength, he tears the skeletal mask away, revealing an equally skull-like face. His sunken eyes lock with yours as the life drains from them, and he finally lies back, dead and cold.
(→R3)
If The Phantom (Tragic Figure) is in play:
At Christine's insistence, you plead with the Phantom, trying to kindle the embers of humanity with him. All seems in vain until at last the Phantom's aggression falters, and Christine embraces him. "Poor Erik... poor unhappy Erik..." she utters with a quaver in her voice, and pulls away his mask to plant a kiss on his forehead. The Phantom chokes in surprise and staggers as if dealt a mortal blow. His will to continue this mad plot is broken.
(→R4)

cards.name: Grand Foyer
cards.text: [action]: Resign. You concede defeat to the Phantom and flee the opera house. [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Parley. Look at the revealed side of a concealed mini-card at this location. You may choose and discard an additional card from your hand to expose the chosen mini-card.

cards.flavor: The masquerade guests remain blissfully unaware of the grave danger and continue their revelry loudly.
cards.name: Grand Foyer
Grand Foyer
cards.text: [action]: Resign. You concede defeat to the Phantom and flee the opera house. [action] Spend 1 resource: Parley. Look at the revealed side of a concealed mini-card at this location. You may spend an additional resource to expose the chosen mini-card.

cards.flavor: The masquerade guests remain blissfully unaware of the grave danger and continue their revelry loudly.
cards.name: Grand Foyer
Grand Foyer
cards.text: [action]: Resign. You concede defeat to the Phantom and flee the opera house. [action]: Parley. Gather each concealed mini-card from each copy of Grand Foyer, remove a decoy from the collected cards, then randomly distribute the remaining concealed mini-cards among all copies of Grand Foyer. (Group limit once per round.)

cards.flavor: The masquerade guests remain blissfully unaware of the grave danger and continue their revelry loudly.
cards.name: Grand Foyer
Grand Foyer
cards.text: [action]: Resign. You concede defeat to the Phantom and flee the opera house. [action]: Parley. Reduce the shroud value of this location by 2 for the next investigate, fight, or evade action performed this round.

cards.flavor: The masquerade guests remain blissfully unaware of the grave danger and continue their revelry loudly.
cards.name: Grand Foyer
Grand Foyer
cards.text: [action]: Resign. You concede defeat to the Phantom and flee the opera house. [action]: Parley. Choose a concealed mini-card at this location and look at its revealed side. If the chosen card is a decoy, you must either take 1 damage or 1 horror, or add a decoy to this location and shuffle all concealed mini-cards at this location. (Limit once per round.)

cards.flavor: The masquerade guests remain blissfully unaware of the grave danger and continue their revelry loudly.
cards.name: Grand Foyer
Auditorium
cards.text: [free]: Move a concealed mini-card from any revealed location to Auditorium. (Group limit once per round.) Forced - When the agenda advances, if there are 1 or more investigators at Auditorium: Each investigator at Auditorium must either take 3 damage or lose 2 actions. (Max once per game.)

cards.flavor:
The empty theater is lit by a gaudy chandelier --
one which the opera managers assure you
is far sturdier than the last.
cards.name: Auditorium
Backstage
cards.text: Objective - If there are 1[per_investigator] or more clues on the current act and each undefeated investigator is at Backstage: Advance the act. [free] Discard an asset you control: Look at the revealed sides of any two concealed mini-cards at this location.

cards.flavor: The theater's backstage is as much a warehouse for past productions as it is a staging ground for the current operas.  It would be easy to hide a needle in this haystack.
cards.name: Backstage

cards.flavor: It's not the Phantom's lair, but it's a start.
cards.name: Box Five
cards.text: [reaction] When the last clue is discovered from Box Five: Look at the revealed sides of any 1[per_investigator] concealed mini-cards in play. (Group limit once per game.)

cards.flavor: According to popular rumor, the Phantom reserved box five for himself, under threat of violent retaliation.
cards.name: Box Five
Hidden Parlor
cards.text:
[free] Take 1 damage or 1 horror: Look at the revealed side of any concealed mini-card.
[free] If there are 1[per_investigator] or more non-[[Elite]] enemies in the shadows and there is no horror on Hidden Parlor: Place 1 horror on Hidden Parlor.

cards.flavor: You must escape this fiendish trap!
cards.name: Hidden Parlor
cards.text: Investigators cannot enter Hidden Parlor. Concealed mini-cards cannot be placed at Hidden Parlor. Forced - After Organ Chamber is revealed: Reveal Hidden Parlor. Shuffle each concealed mini-card in play and redistribute them between each [[Underground]] location equally.

cards.name: Organ Chamber
cards.text:
Organ Chamber gets -1 shroud value for every 1[per_investigator] concealed mini-cards at this location.
[action]: Move a concealed mini-card from a connecting location to Organ Chamber.  If there are 2[per_investigator] or more concealed mini-cards at Organ Chamber and there is no horror on Organ Chamber, place 1 horror on Organ Chamber.

cards.flavor:
You must escape this fiendish trap
and bring the Phantom to justice!
cards.name: Organ Chamber
cards.text: Investigators cannot enter Organ Chamber. Concealed mini-cards cannot be placed at Organ Chamber. Forced - After The Phantom is exposed: Reveal Organ Chamber.

cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text: Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right. Forced - When you start your turn at this location: Take 1 damage, 1 horror, or lose 1 action. [reaction] After you your turn begins: Look at the revealed side of a concealed mini-card at this location.

cards.flavor:
Are you holding your breath from the sewer stench,
or to steady your nerves while the chase continues?
cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text: Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right.

cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text:
Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right.
[reaction] After you fail a test while investigating at this location, discard a card from your hand with printed cost X or more, where X is the amount you failed by: Look at the revealed side of a concealed mini-card at this location.

cards.flavor:
Are you holding your breath from the sewer stench,
or to steady your nerves while the chase continues?
cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text: Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right.

cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text:
Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right.
[reaction] After you fail a test while fighting at this location, discard a card from your hand with printed cost X or more, where X is the amount you failed by: Look at the revealed side of a concealed mini-card at this location.

cards.flavor:
Are you holding your breath from the sewer stench,
or to steady your nerves while the chase continues?
cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text: Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right.

cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text:
Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right.
[reaction] After you fail a test while evading at this location, discard a card from your hand with printed cost X or more, where X is the amount you failed by: Look at the revealed side of a concealed mini-card at this location.

cards.flavor:
Are you holding your breath from the sewer stench,
or to steady your nerves while the chase continues?
cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text: Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right.

cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text:
Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right.
[free] During a skill test at this location, exhaust a non-permanent asset you control: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1. (Group limit twice per test.)

cards.flavor:
Are you holding your breath from the sewer stench,
or to steady your nerves while the chase continues?
cards.name: Paris Sewers
cards.text: Paris Sewers is connected to the other copy of Paris Sewers to the left and right.

cards.name: The Phantom's Lair
cards.text: Forced - After you end your turn at The Phantom's Lair and you did not discover clues or expose concealed mini-cards this round: Take 1 damage or 1 horror. [action]: Add 1 clue to The Phantom's Lair. If there are 2[per_investigator] or more clues on The Phantom's Lair and there is no horror on The Phantom's Lair, place 1 horror on it.

cards.flavor: Distorted organ music echoes through the sewers.
cards.name: The Phantom's Lair
cards.text: Concealed mini-cards cannot be placed at The Phantom's Lair. Objective - At the end of the round, if there are 1[per_investigator] or more clues on the current act: Move each investigator directly to The Phantom's Lair. Advance the act.

cards.name: The Persian
cards.text:
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [combat].
[reaction] After the last clue is discovered from your location, exhaust The Persian: Reduce the cost of the next event played this round by 2. (Limit once per location.)
[reaction] After you expose a decoy, exhaust The Persian: Move to a connecting location or move a clue from a revealed connecting location to your location.

cards.name: Christine Daaé
cards.text: The Phantom gains: "[action]: Parley. Test [willpower] or [intellect] (4). If you succeed, place 1 clue on The Phantom from the token bank. Investigators at your location may spend 2 clues they control to place an additional clue on the Phantom. If you fail, the Phantom attacks you. If there are 2[per_investigator] or more clues on The Phantom, flip The Phantom, exhaust him, and disengage him. Then, move Christine Daaé to the victory display."

cards.name: The Scorpion
cards.text:
[reaction] When you reveal an [elder_sign], "+1" or "0" token during a skill test: Cancel that token and heal 1 damage or 1 horror.  (Limit once per test)
[reaction] After you cancel or ignore any card effect or game effect, exhaust The Scorpion: Discover a clue at your location.

cards.name: The Grasshopper
cards.text: [reaction] When you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token during a skill test, take 1 damage or 1 horror: Ignore the effects of that token (but not its modifier). [reaction] After damage or horror is placed on your investigator card, exhaust The Grasshopper: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

cards.flavor: "Must you dig up such miserable details?"
cards.name: Buried Sorrows
cards.text: Concealed 1. Forced - After you expose Buried Sorrows's mini-card via investigating or a card effect that discovers clues: Buried Sorrows attacks you.

cards.name: Chaotic Minion (A)
cards.text: Aloof. While Chaotic Minion (A) is in the shadows, increase the printed cost of each non-weakness event in a player's hand by 1. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase, if Chaotic Minion (A) is at a location: Chaotic Minion (A) gains concealed 1 until the end of the round. Move it to the shadows and resolve its concealed keyword.

cards.name: Chaotic Minion (B)
cards.text: Aloof. While Chaotic Minion (B) is in the shadows, increase the printed cost of each non-weakness asset in a player's hand by 1. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase, if Chaotic Minion (B) is at a location: Chaotic Minion (B) gains concealed 1 until the end of the round. Move it to the shadows and resolve its concealed keyword.

cards.flavor: "Consider this to be a veiled threat."
cards.name: Simmering Anger
cards.text: Concealed 1. Forced - After you expose Simmering Anger's mini-card via fighting or a card effect that deals damage: Simmering Anger attacks you.

cards.flavor: "Laugh and the world laughs at you."
cards.name: Stifled Laughter
cards.text: Concealed 1. Forced - After you expose Stifled Laughter's mini-card via evading or a card effect that automatically evades an enemy: Stifled Laughter attacks you.

cards.flavor: "Talking of death, I MUST SING HIS REQUIEM!"
cards.name: The Phantom
cards.text: Concealed 1. Forced - When The Phantom is exposed: Immediately return The Phantom to the shadows and resolve his concealed keyword. Do not remove other concealed mini-cards from play while resolving this effect.

cards.flavor:
"Ah, I am not going to die yet...
presently I shall... but let me cry!"
cards.name: The Phantom
cards.text: Aloof. The Phantom cannot ready or be engaged. Objective - The Phantom directs you to escape his lair. The investigators may advance the current act.

cards.name: Always Watching (Bait)
cards.text: Revelation - Put Always Watching (Bait) into play next to the agenda deck. Forced - After you expose a concealed mini-card via investigating or card effects that discover clues: Lose an action. Forced - At the end of the round, if The Phantom's mini-card was exposed this round: Discard Always Watching (Bait).

cards.name: Always Watching (Feint)
cards.text: Revelation - Put Always Watching (Feint) into play next to the agenda deck. Forced - After you expose a concealed mini-card via evading or card effects that automatically evade enemies: Lose an action. Forced - At the end of the round, if The Phantom's mini-card was exposed this round: Discard Always Watching (Feint).

cards.name: Always Watching (Goad)
cards.text: Revelation - Put Always Watching (Goad) into play next to the agenda deck. Forced - After you expose a concealed mini-card via fighting or card effects that deal damage: Lose an action. Forced - At the end of the round, if The Phantom's mini-card was exposed this round: Discard Always Watching (Goad).

cards.name: Angel of Music
cards.text: Revelation - If there is no copy of Angel of Music in play, put it into play next to the agenda deck. Otherwise, it gains surge. Each investigator's maximum hand size is reduced by X, where X is the number of concealed mini-cards at that investigator's location. Forced - At the end of the round, if The Phantom's mini-card was exposed this round: Discard Angel of Music.

cards.name: Echoing Threats
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, take 2 horror. If you fail by 3 or more and there are 1 or more enemies in the shadows, place a decoy at your location, flip it facedown, and shuffle each concealed mini-card at that location. If you succeed by 2 or more, you may reveal a concealed mini-card at your location.

cards.name: Fixation
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Attach Fixation to the non-permanent non-story asset you control with the highest printed cost. If you cannot attach Fixation to an asset, it gains surge. Forced - After you activate or trigger an ability on the attached asset: Discard the attached asset or The Phantom attacks you (regardless of location).

cards.name: Insidious Trick
cards.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] or [agility] (4). If you fail, move to the connecting location with the fewest concealed mini-cards and take 1 damage or 1 horror. If you succeed, you may reveal a concealed mini-card at your location.

cards.name: Shrouded Faces
cards.text: Peril. Revelation - Attach Shrouded Faces to an enemy and place 1 doom on Shrouded Faces. Attached enemy gets +1 fight and +1 horror. Forced - After the attached enemy is exposed or evaded: Discard Shrouded Faces.

cards.name: Signs of Madness
cards.text: Revelation - Attach Signs of Madness to the location with the most concealed mini-cards without another copy attached. Attached location gets +2 shroud value. [free] If there are 1 or more enemies in the shadows: Place a decoy at your location, flip it facedown, and shuffle each concealed mini-card at that location. Discard Signs of Madness. [action] [action]: Discard Signs of Madness.

cards.name: Terrible Guise
cards.text: Revelation - Spawn Terrible Guise at a connecting location or take 1 horror and spawn Terrible Guise engaged with you (choose one). Hunter. X is equal to the number of concealed mini-cards at Terrible Guise's location (max 5).

cards.name: The Phantom Strikes!
cards.text: Revelation - Test [agility] (3). If you fail, take 2 damage. If you fail by 3 or more and there are 1 or more enemies in the shadows, place a decoy at your location, flip it facedown, and shuffle each concealed mini-card at that location. If you succeed by 2 or more, you may reveal a concealed mini-card at your location.

cards.name: Violent Shade
cards.text: Revelation - Spawn Violent Shade at a connecting location or take 1 damage and spawn Violent Shade engaged with you (choose one). Hunter. X is equal to the number of concealed mini-cards at Violent Shade's location (max 5).
